   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to HadesR's documentation!
==================================

HadesR does (relative) location of events with respect to each other, using their P- and S-wave arrival times.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   modules
   notebooks/input_file_maker
   notebooks/synthetic_example
